title: Morning Joe 6/11/21
description: The Justice Department under President Trump seized records from Apple for metadata of House Intelligence Committee members, according to New York Times reporting. Michael Schmidt joins Morning Joe to discuss the new report.
author: news.podcasts@nbcuni.com (NBC News)
